title: Drawing, "Rain Falling from a Cloudy Sky over Mountain Ridges, Hacienda Chillo, Ecuador", July 27, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at bottom left: Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d; at center left:  Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed with numbers throughout, and at lower left: Hacienda Chillo June 27th / 57; again at lower center:  x Beautiful Blue misty / effect among the mountains / rain / O purple grey; and again at lower right:  2 Dazzling light blue / 3 Purplish / 4 rich orange / 5 Brilliant warm orange ragged / 6 grey with warm reflected lights / 7 transparent effect / 8 Dark grey / 9 Lighter grey
description: Horizontal view of a sky filled with clouds and indications of rain falling over mountain ridges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rain Falling from a Cloudy Sky over Mountain Ridges, Hacienda Chillo, Ecuador", July 27, 1857.
July 27, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-280.
